TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerResponse extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListenerResponse Implements IDisposable
public ref class HttpListenerResponse sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 物件所處理之要求的回應。

span.span: Represents a response to a request being handled by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當用戶端會提出資源要求由物件，要求和回應都會提供給您的應用程式中物件。When a client makes a request for a resource handled by an object, the request and response are made available to your application in an object. 要求由物件，並位於屬性。The request is represented by an object and is available in the property. 回應由物件，並位於屬性。The response is represented by an object and is available in the property. 您可以藉由設定各種屬性，例如自訂的回應， ，和。You can customize the response by setting various properties, such as , , and . 使用屬性，以取得將資料寫入至哪一個回應的執行個體。Use the property to obtain a instance to which response data can be written. 最後，將回應資料傳送至用戶端藉由呼叫方法。Finally, send the response data to the client by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉與用戶端的連線，而不傳送回應。

span.span: Closes the connection to the client without sending a response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已經關閉的物件上呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。Calling this method on an object that has already been closed has no effect. 如果尚未關閉的回應，這個方法會關閉它和相關聯和物件。If the response has not already been closed, this method closes it and the associated and objects. 用戶端的連線也是已關閉，而不論之用戶端要求的屬性值。The connection to the client is also closed, regardless of the property value of the client request.

summary.span: 將指定的標頭和值加入至這個回應的 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Adds the specified header and value to the HTTP headers for this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法就相當於呼叫方法所傳回的集合上屬性。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method on the collection returned by the property. 如果在指定的標頭`name`不存在，這個方法會插入新的標頭至屬性的集合。If the header specified in `name` does not exist, this method inserts a new header into the property's collection. 如果`name`存在於集合中，現有值與這個方法會取代`value`。If `name` is present in the collection, this method replaces the existing value with `value`. 若要新增至現有的標頭的值，而不取代現有的值，使用方法。To add a value to an existing header without replacing the existing value, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將使用這個屬性的標頭。The following code example demonstrates adding a header using this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Content-Length`標頭表示回應的主體資料的長度，以位元組為單位。The `Content-Length` header expresses the length, in bytes, of the response's body data. 當使用一種格式，不會傳送資料區塊，或您必須將未經處理、屬性。When using a format that does not send the data chunked or raw, you must set the property. 如果您未這麼做，不會傳送回應資料。If you do not, the does not send the response data. 如需回應標頭的完整清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of response headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. summary.span: 取得或設定隨回應所傳回之 Cookie 的集合。

A that contains cookies to accompany the response.

value.span: 如果沒有 Cookie 加入回應，則為空集合。

span.span: The collection is empty if no cookies have been added to the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是從儲存在本機 （用戶端） 的電腦的 Web 伺服器的名稱/值的文字資料。A cookie is name/value text data from a Web server that is stored on the local (client) computer. 支援下列的 cookie 格式：Netscape、 RFC 2109，以及 RFC 2965。The following cookie formats are supported: Netscape, RFC 2109, and RFC 2965. Netscape cookie 規格將會位於http://wp.netscape.com/newsref/std/cookie_spec.html; 的 RFC 文件位於[ https://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。The Netscape cookie specification is available at http://wp.netscape.com/newsref/std/cookie_spec.html; the RFC documents are available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查 cookie 的要求，並傳回新的 cookie 與回應，如果要求未訂用帳戶。The following code example checks a request for a cookie, and returns a new cookie with the response if the request did not have one. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyFrom(class System.Net.HttpListenerResponse templateResponse) cil managed

param.name: templateResponse
param.span: 要複製的 執行個體。

span.span: The instance to copy.

summary.span: 從指定的 複製屬性至這個回應。

span.span: Copies properties from the specified to this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您定期變更許多屬性從其預設值為一組固定的新值，並方便使用做為範本的執行個體。If you regularly change many properties from their default values to a fixed set of new values, it is convenient to use an instance as a template. 自訂範本回應，一次，並且不需要個別設定每個回應，請呼叫根據範本在回應中的屬性值的方法，以設定新的回應。Customize the template response once and, instead of configuring each response separately, call the method to configure a new response based on property values in the template response. 下列屬性將複製自`templateResponse`目前執行個體。The following properties are copied from `templateResponse` to the current instance. - - - - - - ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立回應複製範本回應。The following code example demonstrates creating a response by copying a template response. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得或設定伺服器所傳回之標頭名稱/值組的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs returned by the server.

value.span: 執行個體，包含回應中所要包含的所有明確設定 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: A instance that contains all the explicitly set HTTP headers to be included in the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回應標頭包含中繼資料資訊，例如日期和時間的回應，回應的伺服器，並在回應主體中包含的資料的 MIME 類型的身分識別。Response headers contain metadata information such as the date and time of the response, the identity of the responding server, and the MIME type of the data contained in the response body. 如需回應標頭的完整清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of response headers, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 如果您嘗試設定內容長度保持連線、 傳輸編碼，或使用的標頭屬性時，發生例外狀況的 WWW 驗證標頭將會擲回。If you attempt to set a Content-Length, Keep-Alive, Transfer-Encoding, or WWW-Authenticate header using the Headers property, an exception will be thrown. 使用或屬性來設定這些標頭。Use the or properties to set these headers. 您無法手動設定的傳輸編碼，或 Www-authenticate 標頭。You cannot set the Transfer-Encoding or WWW-Authenticate headers manually. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示中的標頭。The following code example demonstrates displaying the headers in a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#23)]

exception.span: 為設定作業指定的 執行個體，對回應無效。

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器是否要求持續性連線。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server requests a persistent connection.

value.span: 如果伺服器要求持續性連線，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the server requests a persistent connection; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 用戶端和伺服器會預期在短期內多次交換資料，持續連線加快其通訊，讓它們能夠避免來開啟和關閉每個訊息的 TCP 連線所需的額外負荷。If an HTTP client and server expect to exchange data multiple times in a short period, a persistent connection speeds up their communications by allowing them to avoid the overhead required to open and close a TCP connection for each message. 持續連線是普遍使用在現代網頁瀏覽器與 Web 伺服器之間的通訊。Persistent connections are in widespread use in communications between modern Web browsers and Web servers. 在 HTTP/1.1 通訊協定規格 (RFC 2616) 可用在 RTF 編輯器的網站中將詳細說明持續連線 ([https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/))。Persistent connections are described in detail in the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification (RFC 2616) available at the RTF Editor Web site ([https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#7)]

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the HTTP header in this response.

value.span: ，包含 標頭中要傳送至用戶端的絕對 URL。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Location`標頭會指定要將用戶端導向到要求的資源的 URL。The `Location` header specifies the URL to which the client is directed to locate a requested resource. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性不會自動設定屬性。Setting this property does not automatically set the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SendChunked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SendChunked : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出回應是否使用區塊傳輸編碼方式。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the response uses chunked transfer encoding.

value.span: 如果回應設為使用區塊傳輸編碼方式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the response is set to use chunked transfer encoding; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區塊處理訊息的本文是一系列的區塊組成。The body of a chunked message is made up of a series of chunks. 每個區塊分成兩個部分-區塊資料和實際資料的大小。Each chunk comprises of two parts - the size of the chunk data and the actual data. 當設定為 true 的回應會傳送使用區塊傳輸編碼方式。When set to true the response is sent using chunked transfer encoding.

span.span: Adds or updates a in the collection of cookies sent with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個 cookie 會被視為相同的值及其， ，和屬性都相同。Two cookies are considered the same if the values of their , , and properties are the same. 如果這三項資訊是相同的該方法會嘗試更新的 cookie。If these three pieces of information are the same, the method attempts to update the cookie. 名稱和網域的比較不區分大小寫，但路徑比較會區分大小寫。The name and domain comparisons are not case sensitive, but the path comparison is case sensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int StatusCode { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.StatusCode : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定傳回至用戶端的 HTTP 狀態碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP status code to be returned to the client.

value.span: 值，指定所要求之資源的 HTTP 狀態碼。

span.span: An value that specifies the HTTP status code for the requested resource.

value.span: 預設值為 ，指出伺服器成功處理用戶端的要求，並在回應主體中包含所要求的資源。

span.span: The default is , indicating that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端會使用由伺服器傳回狀態碼，決定要如何繼續進行。Clients use the status code returned by the server to decide how to proceed. 值為表示伺服器已成功處理用戶端的要求，並在回應主體中包含所要求的資源。A value of indicates that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body. 其他常見狀態碼包含，指出在伺服器上，找不到要求的資源和，表示這不必要的回應主體中傳回要求的資源，因為用戶端的快取的複本資源是最新狀態。Other common status codes include , indicating that the requested resource was not found on the server, and , indicating that it was unnecessary to return the requested resource in the response body because the client's cached copy of the resource is up-to-date. 如需可能的狀態碼的完整清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of possible status codes, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#7)]

span.span: Valid values are between 100 and 999 inclusive.

span.span: The default is the RFC 2616 description for the property value, or an empty string ("") if an RFC 2616 description does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 狀態描述通常會提供詳細資料，說明值。The status description typically provides details that explain the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property.
